item.title: Enterprise Node.js and Microservices talk at Node.js Dublin
item.description:
Last night, Damian Beresford from the FeedHenry Engineering team gave a talk at Node.js Dublin about our use of Node.js in the Enterprise. The resulting 20+ minute Q&A tells you it went down very well indeed with the audience! Two of the real hot-button topics were Microservices and the Operations approach around this type of platform. Expect to read a lot more here on both of these in the coming weeks.

Here is Damian’s deck:

** Node.js Dublin Meetup April 2014 ** from dberesford
